## Let's finish the example semester project  

Check out the [R code](https://github.com/jlacasa/stat705_fall2024/blob/main/homeworks/finalproj_tutorial.Rmd) or [tutorial html](https://jlacasa.github.io/stat705_fall2024/homeworks/finalproj_tutorial).

- **What is expected**  
  - Provide understandable context.  
  - The objective is connected to the statistical model. 
  - The statistical model is appropriate and matches the code.  
  - The results are well interpreted.  
  
- **What is not expected**  
  - Super-fancy statistical models  
  - Statistical models you don't understand (or don't understand the intuition behind)
